title: Civil War soldiers finally get a proper burial in Colorado
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Yesterday 
Gravestones have been dedicated to four Civil War soldiers who had been buried in unmarked graves at Roselawn Cemetery in Pueblo and went un...
